Indiana University
BLOOMINGTON. INDIANA
Radio and Television Service
February 11, 1956
Mr. 0-eorge Jennings
Board of Education
Chicago 1, Illinois
Dear G-eorge:
I received the copies of the January issue of the JOURNAL OF THE
AERT with my article in it.
I t:
Thank you very, very much. I have sent one copy to the manager of
| Mexico’s educational station, XFUN, one copy to Cuba’s educational
1 outlet, CMZ, and will send the others to similar broadcasters in
| a few of the other Latin American republics. So the AERT name will
j be ci culated where it can get more latinos interested in
I our group here.
I hope when it is convenient, you will send that film we discussed
in person (dealing with use of equipment), so that my fledglings in
broadcast can see it.
Thanks again.
Best wishes, and
Cordially,
7^h4/
Marvin Alisky
Asst. Prof., Radio-Tv and Journalism
